org.apache.oodt.cas.catalog.struct

Interface IngestService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSourceIndex, InMemoryIndex

    public interface IngestService
    Version:
    $Revision$

    A Interface for performing ingests to an Index

    Author:
    bfoster

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(TransactionId<?> transactionId)
      Deletes all TermBuckets attached to given TransactionId -- there should be no trace of given transaction after this method is called.
      IngestReceipt ingest(List<TermBucket> termBuckets)
      Indexes the given TermBucket to a TransactionId, and returns a IngestReceipt
      boolean reduce(TransactionId<?> transactionId, List<TermBucket> termBuckets)
      Deletes only the Terms in the given TermBuckets from the given TransactionId
      IngestReceipt update(TransactionId<?> transactionId, List<TermBucket> termBuckets)
      TermBucket updates to given TransactionId.

    • Method Detail

      • ingest

        IngestReceipt ingest(List<TermBucket> termBuckets)
              throws IngestServiceException
        Indexes the given TermBucket to a TransactionId, and returns a IngestReceipt
        Parameters:
        termBuckets - The List of TermBucket to be ingested
        Returns:
        IngestReceipt Receipt of ingest
        Throws:
        IngestServiceException - Any error

      • update

        IngestReceipt update(TransactionId<?> transactionId,
                     List<TermBucket> termBuckets)
              throws IngestServiceException
        TermBucket updates to given TransactionId. A new TransactionId can be returned in IngestReceipt if so desired and it will automatically get remapped by CatalogService. Existing metadata for given TransactionId should not be deleted, just the terms in the given term buckets should be modified. For a complete re-ingest, one should instead delete() then ingest().
        Parameters:
        transactionId -
        termBuckets -
        Throws:
        IngestServiceException

      • delete

        boolean delete(TransactionId<?> transactionId)
        throws IngestServiceException
        Deletes all TermBuckets attached to given TransactionId -- there should be no trace of given transaction after this method is called.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The ID for given transaction which should be erased
        Throws:
        IngestServiceException - Any error

      • reduce

        boolean reduce(TransactionId<?> transactionId,
               List<TermBucket> termBuckets)
        throws IngestServiceException
        Deletes only the Terms in the given TermBuckets from the given TransactionId
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The TransactionId for which Terms will be deleted
        termBuckets - The reduction set of Terms for each TermBucket
        Throws:
        IngestServiceException - Any error
